definition: lit. an arrogant army is bound to lose (idiom)/fig. pride goes before a fall
proud/arrogant
soldiers/a force/an army/weapons/arms/military/warlike/CL:個|个[ge4]
certainly/must/will/necessarily
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.chinese: 圣经箴言16:18里写道“骄兵必败”。

sentences.english: He almost always walks to work.
sentences.chinese: 他几乎总是走骄兵必败。

sentences.english: The teacher told us pride comes before a fall.
sentences.chinese: 老师告诉我们骄兵必败。

sentences.english: Don't be proud, because pride goes before a fall.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要骄傲，因为骄兵必败。

definition: to lose Jingzhou due to carelessness (idiom)/to suffer a major setback due to negligence
to underestimate the enemy
there can never be too much deception in war/in war nothing is too deceitful/all's fair in war
no arrogance in victory, no despair in defeat
pinyin: sheng4 bu4 jiao1 , bai4 bu4 nei3

definition: however strong you are, there is always someone stronger (idiom)/there is always sth more to learn/never be satisfied to rest on your laurels/there is no room for complacency
pinyin: qiang2 zhong1 zi4 you3 qiang2 zhong1 shou3

definition: complacent/self-satisfied
(idiom) complacency leads to loss, modesty brings profit/pride comes before a fall
pinyin: man3 zhao1 sun3 , qian1 shou4 yi4

definition: see 強中自有強中手|强中自有强中手[qiang2 zhong1 zi4 you3 qiang2 zhong1 shou3]
pinyin: qiang2 zhong1 geng4 you3 qiang2 zhong1 shou3

definition: to emerge victorious in every battle/to be ever-victorious
so pleased as to lose one's sense of measure/beside oneself with joy
see 成則為王，敗則為寇|成则为王，败则为寇[cheng2 ze2 wei2 wang2 , bai4 ze2 wei2 kou4]
failed and wiped over the floor (idiom); to fail utterly/a crushing defeat/beaten and in a hopeless position
commonplace in military operations (idiom)
Fall into the moat and you'll be wiser next time (idiom); One only learns from one's mistakes.
pinyin: chi1 yi1 qian4 , zhang3 yi1 zhi4

definition: arrogant and conceited
lit. for a nobleman to take revenge, ten years is not too long (idiom)/fig. revenge is a dish best served cold
pinyin: jun1 zi5 bao4 chou2 , shi2 nian2 bu4 wan3
